cause.description:
You've seen them chillin with their boys, wearing there popped collars, Abercrombie and Fitch waterpolo t's, and their prefrayed visors tilted to the side, listening to Jack Johnson, while playing game cube and knocking down a six pack of natty ice... I'm talking of course about Bros. Did you know that for every suburban house party 4 bros will be raped, but only 1 will tell his boys. Because of this Bro Rape has gone unchecked for centuries. By making people aware you can help stop these horrible travisties that have plagued our society for to long. ONLY YOU CAN PREVENT BRO RAPE!!!
1. while bro rape is admittely tempting it is morally wrong and we should try to refrain from this act
2. Stopping bro rape is a procees that until we have recruited every frat boy in the country will not be complete
cause.name: Stop Bro Rape!!!
